context: tonsillectomy & adenoidectomy. chronic tonsillitis with symptomatic tonsil and adenoid hypertrophy.

text: chronic tonsillitis with symptomatic tonsil and adenoid hypertrophy
context: preoperative diagnosis: chronic tonsillitis with symptomatic tonsil and adenoid hypertrophy.
the tonsils were 3+ enlarged and cryptic.
the left tonsil was grasped with a tonsil tenaculum. the tonsil was removed with the gold laser.
the adenoid area was inspected. the adenoids were small.
the tonsil was removed with the gold laser.
both tonsillar fossae were injected with 0.25% marcaine with adrenaline.
